sets.name: Redirection Support
sets.description:
• This EV spread and nature allow Amoonguss to survive two consecutive Make It Rain attacks from Choice Specs Gholdengo, then dumps the remaining EVs into Defense.

  • 28 Speed IVs allow Amoonguss to underspeed Brave nature Iron Hands and Kingambit inside of Trick Room but otherwise retains more Speed for use outside of Trick Room.

This is a sample set as we work on proper analyses. Stay tuned!

sets.name: Thanos
sets.description:
• The given EV spread prioritizes increasing Annihilape's special bulk, but retains enough Attack to OHKO Chi-Yu with Drain Punch and enough speed to move before Modest Pelipper.

This is a sample set as we work on proper analyses. Stay tuned!

sets.name: Bulky Utility
sets.description:
• This EV spread and nature ensures that Ting Lu always OHKOs Chi-Yu with Stomping Tantrum or Earthquake, and then uses the remaining EVs to maximize its special bulk.

This is a sample set as we work on proper analyses. Stay tuned!
